name: yakshaver
description: YakShaver, an AI agent to help you trim the fluff and get straight to the point

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd src/ui && npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.package: npm run build && cd src/ui && npm run build && cd ../.. && electron-builder --dir
scripts.make: npm run build && cd src/ui && npm run build && cd ../.. && electron-builder  --config electron-builder.config.js
scripts.publish: npm run build && cd src/ui && npm run build && cd ../.. && electron-builder --publish always --config electron-builder.config.js
